title: Find a Backhaul Load
description: A driver is about to deliver a load, leaving them empty. A dispatcher needs to find a 'backhaul' load originating near the delivery location to avoid an empty return trip.

tasks.description: Identify that a driver will be empty in a specific city tomorrow.
tasks.expected_outcome: Dispatcher knows they need to find a load for this driver.

tasks.description: Search an external load board for available loads picking up in or near the driver's location.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system returns a list of available loads from various brokers.

tasks.description: Filter the loads to find one that is profitable and matches the driver's equipment and destination preference.
tasks.expected_outcome: The dispatcher identifies a suitable load.

tasks.description: Contact the broker to book the load.
tasks.expected_outcome: The backhaul load is secured, ensuring a profitable return trip.
